detail_desc: Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxy cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, large buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, high-waisted slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and straight legs.
Longer-style, straight-cut jacket in stretch jersey with notch lapels, patch front pockets and no fasteners. Unlined.

Straight-cut shirt in a viscose weave with a gently tapered waist, narrow turn-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

KATE MORGAN x H&M. Sleeveless dress in an airy, patterned weave with elastication at the top and narrow, braided shoulder straps with a tassel at one side. Elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved dresses in cotton jersey with a print motif and a seam at the hem with a gathered flounce.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton. Jersey top with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder, an open chest pocket and contrasting colour neckline. Trousers in woven fabric with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly, leg pocket with a decorative button, and elasticated hems.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt pockets with a decorative button at the back. Legs with creases.
Cold shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves, decorative buttons down the front and a smocked hem.

Loose-fitting blouse in an airy viscose weave with an opening at the top and small stand-up collar that ties at the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with hole embroidery and buttoned cuffs.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and soft brushed inside.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter approx. 5.5 cm.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a yoke and short sleeves in stretch lace.
Dress in striped sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool in a slightly longer style with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Hat in a soft, nepped rib knit with a small appliqué on the turned-up hem.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Metal rings in various designs.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with a zip at the top and a sturdy, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle. One zipped outer compartment. Lined. Depth 10 cm. Height 27 cm. Width 33.5 cm.
Long earrings in metal, glass and plastic. Length 9 cm.

Fleece-lined ski jacket in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, lined hood. Zip down the front, side pockets, a zipped chest pocket, zipped sleeve pocket, and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short-sleeved dress in a cotton weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist with narrow, sewn-in ties and an A-line skirt. Unlined.

Short, double-breasted, padded down jacket with a large, padded collar and concealed press-stud fastenings at the front. Diagonal front pockets, an inner pocket and a detachable, padded tie belt at the waist. Lined. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short, A-line skirt with a zip at the back and flounce at the hem.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, and a fake welt back pocket.

Long, round-necked T-shirt in slub cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with a wider neckline with raw roll edges. Open chest pocket, sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem at the front. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and rounded hem.

Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in patterned satin with contrasting colour piping. Shirt with rounded notch lapels and buttons down the front. Shorts with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long sleeves, a small sequined appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and press-studs on one shoulder.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Heel 8 cm.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a large zipped compartment with a carabiner hook and woven handle on the front. Zipped compartment at the back, an inner compartment and an adjustable waist belt with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Size 5x18x32 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist.
Top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed jersey.
Felted wool beret.
LIMITED EDITION. Jacket in soft velour with soft notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Patch front pockets, long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Satin lining.
Pre-tied bow tie in a satin weave with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top and one inner compartment. Size 12x28x30 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a V-neck, buttons at the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trainer-style canvas espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles, cotton canvas insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in a patterned, organic cotton weave with a sailor collar, buttons at the back and contrasting colour trims around the collar and hem. Lined.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Hat knitted in soft cotton with sewn-on ears at the top.
Flower-shaped earrings in thin metal wire. Diameter 4 cm.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a wrapover fastening and small opening at the back, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined at the top. Matching hairband with a sewn-on bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Ankle boots in suede with a zip in one side, covered heals, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Boots in sturdy cotton canvas with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Chunky, patterned soles. Platform front 4.5 cm, heel 6 cm.

Set with a jacket and trousers in soft thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, raglan sleeves and a contrasting colour trim at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist. The polyester content of the set is recycled.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves that finish at the elbows, and a smocked seam at the waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets.
Hat in a cotton knit with appliqués. Ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Tunic in soft viscose jersey with a sheen. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Suede sandals with covered block heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a round buckle. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Mesh hi-tops with rubber details, and a rib-knit shaft with a loop at the back and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in lightweight jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and elasticated hems.
Straight-cut top in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal earrings with a plastic bead.
Ballet pumps with a bow at the front, elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Hipster briefs in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with lace trims at the back. Mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and rounded hem.
Dress in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
